MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryRemove (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Windows.TextDecoration> textDecorations, out System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection result);

.method public hidebysig instance bool TryRemove(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.TextDecoration> textDecorations, [out] class System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection& result) cil managed
Public Function TryRemove (textDecorations As IEnumerable(Of TextDecoration), ByRef result As TextDecorationCollection) As Boolean

span.span: The collection to be removed

param.name: result

span.span: Out parameter containing the result.

param.span: 如果沒有任何項目從目前的集合移除，則 是等同原始集合的新集合。

span.span: If no element was removed from the current collection, then is a new collection identical to the original one.

summary.span: 從目前的集合移除 ，並傳回產生的 (新) 集合。

span.span: Removes a collection of from the current collection and returns the resultant (new) collection.

returns.span: 若至少一個項目已從目前的集合移除則為 ；否則為

span.span: if at least one item was removed from the current collection, otherwise

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前集合維持不變。The current collection remains unchanged. 如果要移除的集合不是目前集合的子集，則會移除沒有任何項目。If the collection to be removed is not a subset of the current collection, then no element is removed. 如果來源集合中有多個項目執行個體，則會移除項目的所有執行個體。If the source collection has multiple instances of an item, then all instances of the item are removed.
